frontmatter.title: In machine learning, synthetic data can offer real performance improvements
frontmatter.description: Models trained on synthetic data can be more accurate than other models in some cases, which could eliminate some privacy, copyright, and ethical concerns from using real data.
frontmatter.author: Adam Zewe
